bot.name: SkyHelper
bot.NOT_SET: None (you can set it via bot's dashboard)

common.NO-WB-PERM-BOT: I do not have `Manage Webhooks` permission in {{CHANNEL}}. Please make sure that there is no channel level permission overwrides and if there is, please grant me the necessary permissions in the said channel before running the command again.

errors.COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: No such command or outdated command
errors.autoCompleteCOMMAND_NOT_FOUND: No choices for this option was found.
errors.AUTOCOMPLETE_ERROR: Oops! An error occured while searching for the choices.
errors.MESSAGE_NO_ARGS:
You didn't provide any arguments

**Available Args**: {{ARGS}}!
errors.NO_PERMS_USER: You don't have necessary permission(s) ({{PERMISSIONS}}) to use this command.
errors.NOT_A_SERVER: Oops! Looks like you ran this command in a server where I'm not in or as an User App command. This command is only meant to be used in a server I am a member of.
errors.NO_PERMS_BOT: I do not have the required permission(s) ({{PERMISSIONS}}) to perform this action. Please run the command again after granting me the necessary permission(s).
errors.COOLDOWN: Please wait, you are on a cooldown for {{COMMAND}}. You can use it again {{TIME}}
errors.EMBED_DESCRIPTION: An error occurred while executing this command. Please include the error ID while submiting the bug report
errors.NOT-ALLOWED: You cannot use menu(s) generated by others!

COMMAN_USED.LABEL: Name of the command.
COMMAN_USED.PLACEHOLDER: The command that produced the said error.

WHAT_HAPPENED.LABEL: Explain what happened?
WHAT_HAPPENED.PLACEHOLDER: Explain in brief what happened. What outcome were you hoping?

VALUE.ACTIVE: {{INDEX}} shard is currently active and ends in {{DURATION}}

times-embed.ACTIVE: {{EVENT}} is currently active (at {{ACTIVE_TIME}}) and will end in {{DURATION}} (at {{END_TIME}})

reminders.EDEN_RESET: Eye of Eden just got reset, statues have been refreshed and can again be saved for ACs!
reminders.DAILY_RESET: The world of Sky just reset and daily quests have been refreshed!
reminders.TITLE: {{TYPE}} Reminder
reminders.ERROR: This is not working as expected
reminders.COMMON: {{TYPE}} just started (at {{TIME}}) and will end at {{TIME-END}} ({{TIME-END-R}})

season.name: season
season.description: select a season for the guide

realms.name: realms
realms.description: directly search for a base spirit`s tree/location

RESPONSES.NO-SPIRITS: Eden doesn't have any spirits, they do not like scary places.
RESPONSES.INVALID-CHOICE: Invalid choice or Guide yet to be updated

RESPONSES.NO_DATA: No data found for {{VALUE}}! If you think this is an error, please let us know via {{COMMAND}}

FIELDS.SUMMARY_DESC_NO_ELIGIBLE: This spirit is not eligible to return as a TS yet, and will become eligible when the season after the {{SEASON}} ends!
FIELDS.SUMMARY_DESC_NO_VISIT: This spirit has not returned yet, when they do return, they'll offer the same items offered during the season but in a restructured friendship tree.

SHARDS.name: shards
SHARDS.description: Get the a specific shard information

DATE.name: date
DATE.description: The date to get the shard information

RESPONSES.INVALID_DATE: Invalid date format. Please use the YYYY-MM-DD format. Max input : **275760-09-12**
RESPONSES.DATE_NONEXIST: {{DATE}} does not exist, please provide a valid date.

RESPONSES.NO_DATA: Oops! It seems no TS data was found, please try again later.
RESPONSES.VISITING: {{SPIRIT}} is currently visiting the realms of Sky. They will depart at {{TIME}} (in {{DURATION}})
RESPONSES.EXPECTED: {{SPIRIT}} will be visiting the realms of Sky on {{DATE}} (in {{DURATION}})

RESPONSES.USER_APP_ERROR: Please run this command in a server I am a member of!
RESPONSES.NOT_CACHED: Not a cached server. Please contact the bot dev(s)
RESPONSES.ROLE_SELECT_PLACEHOLDER: Select a default role to ping!

SHARDS_LIVE.name: shards-live
SHARDS_LIVE.description: auto updating message with live shards details

CHANNEL.name: channel
CHANNEL.description: channel where shard details should be updated

RESPONSES.NOT_GUILD: This command can only be used in a server
RESPONSES.ALREADY_CONFIGURED: {{TYPE}} is already configured in {{CHANNEL}} for this this message {{MESSAGE}}.
RESPONSES.INVALID_CHANNEL: {{CHANNEL}} is not a text channel. Please provide a valid text channel
RESPONSES.CONFIGURED: {{TYPE}} configured for {{CHANNEL}}. This message {{MESSAGE}} will be updated with relevant details.
RESPONSES.ALREADY_DISABLED: {{TYPE}} is already disabled for this server

SKYTIMES_LIVE.name: skytimes-live
SKYTIMES_LIVE.description: auto updating message with live skytimes details

CHANNEL.name: channel
CHANNEL.description: channel where skytimes details should be updated

DAILIES.name: dailies
DAILIES.description: did you do your dailies today?

SEASON_PASS.name: season-pass
SEASON_PASS.description: do you have the season pass?

RESPONSES.NOT_ACTIVE: No active season at the moment. Please run this command when a seson is active.

TIMESTAMP.name: timestamp
TIMESTAMP.description: get unix timestamp for the given date

TIME.name: time
TIME.description: The time to convert (format: HH mm ss)

TIMEZONE.name: timezone
TIMEZONE.description: Your timezone in the format: Continent/City

BOTINFO.name: botinfo
BOTINFO.description: get the bot's info and configure settings

CONTACT-US.name: contact-us
CONTACT-US.description: for suggestions/bug reports/contacting us or just anything

RESPONSES.INVALID-FORMAT: Invalid time format. Please provide time in `HH mm ss` format.
RESPONSES.INVALID-TIMEZONE:
Invalid timezone. Please provide a correct one. Use the format: `Continent/City`.
Use this link to find your timezone if you are not sure: <https://timezonedb.com/time-zones>
RESPONSES.DATE_NOT_EXIST: {{DATE}}  does not exist, please provide a valid date.
RESPONSES.RECIEVED: Your message is received. Here's a preview!

LANGUAGE.name: language
LANGUAGE.description: manage preferred language for the bot's response

CATEGORY.name: category
CATEGORY.description: select a category to set the laguage for

SET.name: set
SET.description: set your/server language for the bot

options.description: select a category type to remove

RESPONSES.NO-PERM: You do not have permission(s) ({{PERMISSION}}) to set a server's language
RESPONSES.SUCCESS:
Language for {{TYPE}} set to {{Language}} succesfully, you may still see english in some places as it is not possible to translate everything. 

Please consider contrubuting to translation of this bot by visiting {{LINK}} and help us add more supported language.

Note: User level language settings will take precedence over server settings (if any).
RESPONSES.ALREADY_SET: {{TYPE}} language setting is already set to {{LANGUAGE}}
RESPONSES.ALREADY_NOT_SET: There's already no language set for {{CATEGORY}}.

RESPONSES.NO_DATA:
No data found for today's daily quests. Please try again later.
-# Please note that it can take upto 30min-1hrs after daily resets for quests to be updated
RESPONSES.OUTDATED: This quest is outdated. Please wait for the quests to be updated.

ABOUT_SHARDS.TIMING: How do I know when a shard comes?
